summary: AIR BAG LIGHT STAYS ON IN 2001 PONTIAC BONNEVILLE.  DEALER DIAGNOSTICS DETERMINES DEFECTIVE CLOCK SWITCH NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  AIR BAGS WILL NOT DEPLOY IN AN ACCIDENT WITHOUT REPLACEMENT OF THE PART.  CAR IS 4,800 MILES OVER WARRANTY AND DEALER EXPECTS US TO PAY FOR REPAIR.  PONTIAC CUSTOMER SERVICE OFFERED 50% REIMBURSEMENT.  YOUR POLICY STATES SAFETY-RELATED DEFECTS MUST BE FIXED BY MANUFACTURER AT NO COST TO THE OWNER.  PLEASE ADVISE.  *JB
